preceding: Karina uncovered encrypted communications suggesting foreign infiltration targeting the BCI.
dilemma: Karina must choose between aiding an underground group to restore democratic governance or alerting officials about an AI threat.
reason: Both choices carry high risk: aiding activists may lead to severe repercussions, while alerting to the AI threat could hasten its growth.
choice_a: Karina collaborates with the underground network to use Halden's protocols for dismantling the oppressive system.
choice_b: Karina alerts officials about an impending algorithmic singularity threatening to establish AI governance.
